docs.snippet: The retailer said it would no longer sell the shirt shown in the image, which appeared to refer to a black child as the “coolest monkey in the jungle.”

headline.print_headline: Monkey Shirt On H&M Site Raises Outcry On Internet
headline.main: H&M Apologizes for ‘Monkey’ Image Featuring Black Child

docs.snippet: Nicholas Casey, Andes bureau chief for The Times, discussed the benefits of technology in many South American countries — and why Google Maps isn’t the best tool there.

headline.print_headline: Explore With Drones, but Ignore Google Maps
headline.main: Using Drones and Netflix in the Andes, but Sidestepping Google Maps

docs.snippet: What does current research reveal about family estrangement?

headline.print_headline: Teaching Activities for: ‘Debunking Myths About Estrangement’
headline.main: Teaching Activities for: ‘Debunking Myths About Estrangement’

docs.snippet: Sir David Attenborough returns to host “Blue Planet II,” and average citizens are thrust into an international incident in “False Flag.”

headline.main: What’s on TV Saturday: ‘Blue Planet II’ and ‘False Flag’

docs.snippet: Cheney Orr knew that Alzheimer’s would take his father away. Photography helped him get to know the man.

headline.main: A Father, a Son, a Disease, and a Camera

docs.abstract: Cheney Orr knew that Alzheimer’s would take his father away. Photography helped him get to know the man.

docs.snippet: This sentence is like a parlor game: You can apply its structure to nearly everything.

headline.main: New Sentences: From ‘The Juniper Tree,’ by Barbara Comyns

docs.snippet: The company was accused of collecting data on children without parents’ permission and failing to keep it secure from hackers. It agreed to pay $650,000.

headline.print_headline: Toymaker VTech Settles  In Child Privacy Law Case
headline.main: Toymaker VTech Settles Charges of Violating Child Privacy Law

docs.snippet: News of the Austrian capital’s first birth of 2018 triggered an outpouring of online hate, because her mother was pictured wearing a head scarf.

headline.print_headline: Vienna Welcomes 2018 Baby  With Online Hate and Racism
headline.main: Vienna ‘New Year’s Baby’ Greeted First With Hate, Then Hearts

docs.snippet: Apple gave us the modern smartphone. Now, it can create a new take on the device by encouraging us to use it more deliberately — and a lot less.

headline.print_headline: It’s Time for a Lot Less iPhone
headline.main: It’s Time for Apple to Build a Less Addictive iPhone

docs.snippet: The announcement, by the Internet Association, made clear that companies like Google, Facebook and Netflix would back a legal fight.

headline.print_headline: Big Tech to Fight Net Neutrality Repeal
headline.main: Big Tech to Join Legal Fight Against Net Neutrality Repeal
